definition: echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises

sentences.english: The rain drummed loudly on the metal roof.
sentences.chinese: 雨點敲擊金屬屋頂，發出很大的聲響。

sentences.english: A ship whistles as it enters the harbor… Is the sound coming from the harbor or from the stereophonic speakers inside the cinema?
sentences.chinese: 大船入港的鳴笛聲響起，是電影院外港邊的聲響？

sentences.english: A ship whistles as it enters the harbor… Is the sound coming from the harbor or from the stereophonic speakers inside the cinema?
sentences.chinese: 大船入港的鳴笛聲響起，是電影院外港邊的聲響？

sentences.english: Then Jaimie heard a noise in the quiet night.
sentences.chinese: 接着，在寂靜的夜裏，傑米聽到了聲響。

sentences.english: We heard fireworks crack all over the village.
sentences.chinese: 我們聽到煙火的劈劈啪啪聲響遍了整個村莊。

sentences.english: The only sound was the soft scruff of their feet upon the steps.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的聲響便是他們的腳叩在石階上的聲音。

sentences.english: December 1, 2006 — Food scientists have discovered why Rice Krispies make their characteristic sound when soaked in milk.
sentences.chinese: 食品學家發現了食物在牛奶中浸泡發出聲響的原因。

sentences.english: Varipowerful's voice echoed, as well as Anduin flinched slightly.
sentences.chinese: 瓦里安的聲響迴響着，讓安度因些微畏縮了點。

sentences.english: When threatened by a predator, hissing cockroaches make loud hisses .
sentences.chinese: 當蟑螂被肉食性動物威脅時，會發出更大的聲響。

sentences.english: What’s the dish in the middle making all the noise?
sentences.chinese: 桌子中間發出聲響的是道什麼菜？

sentences.english: A squeak of wheels and plod of hoofs came from the road.
sentences.chinese: 路邊這時傳來了車輪的吱嘎聲和馬蹄的聲響。

sentences.english: Perhaps the child had made some small noise in her sleep.
sentences.chinese: 也許是孩子夢裏弄出的小聲響吧。

sentences.english: The dog pinned its ears back to catch the faint sound.
sentences.chinese: 那條狗的耳朵向後支着，傾聽細微的聲響。

sentences.english: Speak your mind… even if your voice shakes.
sentences.chinese: 果敢說出你的想法，哪怕聲響會驚怖。
他在鋼琴上亂彈，發出刺耳的聲響。

sentences.english: You can neither sit down nor bend over without making some kind of noise.
sentences.chinese: 你不發出點聲響就坐不下來，腰也彎不下來。

definition: echo/sound/noise/to make a sound/to sound/to ring/loud/classifier for noises
first tone in Mandarin (high, level tone)
yelling (sound made by person)/barking/braying/roaring (sound made by animals)
(of sound) to never stop/to fall incessantly on the ear/to linger on
